name: Slave of War VR
detailed_description:
Gameplay features

  • Fight with the horde of minotaurs!
  • Slay Medusa in fierce battle
  • Defeat all minions of the lord of underworld!
  • Fly like a bird thanks to Hermes sandals
  • Meet awesome ancient world with any of the Oculus Rift and HTC Vive

Story

The battles of the gods never lead to a favorable outcome for ordinary mortals. Next battle between the two brothers, Zeus and Hades, began. Most Greeks are transformed into demons of the underworld. A lot of brave warriors fell in battle with their transformed brethren.
Waking up in the hold of his own ship in shackles and armed with magical artifacts of Hermes, you will under his patronage undergo a series of tests and save the little that survived in the battle of the Titans.
